name: Stick Fight The Game
description:
Stick Fight is a physics-based fighting game where you battle it out as the iconic stick. Fight it out against your friends or find random sticks from around the world!

Single to 2 PLAYERS in either Local.

Simple controls you can perform amazing stunts and blows to defeat your opponents.

Features:
– Amazing skill
– Realistic physics
– 12 campaigns addictive
– 100 Highly Interactive Levels
– Lots of weapons!
